attributes.action: INTRODUCE NON-PARTISAN CONSENSUS DEMOCRACY TO NORTHERN IRELAND
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: INTRODUCE A NON-PARTISAN CONSENSUS DEMOCRACY POLITICAL SYSTEM TO NORTHERN IRELAND WITH A RESTRICTION ON THE LENGTH OF TIME REPRESENTATIVES ARE ALLOWED TO BE IN OFFICE.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
